main event: A sighting of a white, blue, and red object was reported in Columbus, Ohio, on January 22, 1969.
interesting points: The object was observed for 5-6 minutes,It was reported to have moved in a south to south-southwest direction,No photographs were included with the report, The observer theorized it might have been an airplane disappearing over the horizon, The object appeared to crash at the end of the sighting.
sighted object: a white, blue, and red object
